fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- (First) Follow a constellation, dealing an Astral Basic attack to two players.
- (Second) Increase the priority of all of one player's abilities to 6.
- (Third) Randomize the targets of two players. Their targets will not be other Last members, or anyone the First is visiting.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While ordered First or Third, the Eclipser can hear whispers.
- Should a player survive your attacks for any reason, you will learn their role.
